english.segment1: If I see You standing, one hundred stars away. It feels as though You're touching me. If I am landing, with a stormy night delay. It's You I want, it's You I need
english.segment2: When I'm lost I close my eyes. And suddenly I'm home
english.segment3: [Chorus:]. I just wanna run in You. I just wanna hide in You. I just wanna come to You. And not thirst anymore. I just wanna walk with You. I just wanna ride with You. I just wanna talk to You. And not thirst anymore
english.segment4: I feel demanding, I know I'm selfish too. I often live in my own world. I've been commanding, it's my way or we're through. If I am sand, you are the pearl
english.segment5: When I'm found I open my eyes. And it's You I see
